package.description:
Localization algorithm with dynamic objects such as: pedestrians, cyclist, among others. The method uses a dynamic objects detector, then delete the segments tagged as objects and passes this information to the localization algorithm.
The localization is done either by the AMCL method implemented on ROS or by the localization in 3D developed at IRI by Andreu Corominas.
